name: golden rays of sunshine
description:
my second game! wow.

made for the (not-hosted-on-itch [yet?]) vextro game jam 2020

created in

  • gb studio v1.2.1
  • aseprite v1.2.21
  • tiled v1.4.1

with assets from

  • 魔界塔士 Sa・Ga / The Final Fantasy Legend (Square, 1989)
  • Sa・Ga2 秘宝伝説 / Final Fantasy Legend II (Square, 1990)
  • 時空の覇者 Sa・Ga3 / Final Fantasy Legend III (Square, 1991)
  • ゼルダの伝説 ふしぎの木の実 / The Legend of Zelda: Oracles series (Flagship, 2001)
